    Conferences, workshops and seminars


    2024
    - "Seeking unifying principles in equilibrated and driven disordered materials", Sept. 30-Oct. 4, Capri, Italy. Invited talk.
    - Liquid matter conference, Sept. 23-27, Mainz, Germany. Keynote lecture.
    - Cargèse school and workshop on complex and Glassy systems, July 9-20, Cargèse, France. Discussion session with M. Ozawa.
    - "The triple point of failure in glasses and gels", June 18-20, Paris, France. Invited talk.
    - APS march meeting, March 4-8, Minnesota, USA. Invited.
    2023

    - Seminar: Forum de Physique Statistique, ENS, June 21, Paris, France.
    - CECAM workshop "Mesoscale modelling of driven disordered materials: from glasses to active matter", May 24-26, Lausanne, Switzerland. Invited talk.

    - Seminar: Institut Lumière Matière, February 14, Lyon, France.
